createQueries: CREATE TABLE log(source character varying(10),id character varying(36),worker character varying(10),snd timestamp without time zone,rep timestamp without time zone,result character varying(5))
CREATE TABLE errorlog (error character varying, datetime timestamp without time zone)
CREATE TABLE reqdata(source character varying(10),id character varying(36),bankruptid character varying(12),startdate date)
CREATE TABLE messages(source character varying(10),id character varying(36), messageid character varying(10),type character varying(50), date timestamp without time zone
CREATE TABLE creditors(source character varying(10),id character varying(36), name character varying(50), sum integer,debt integer
CREATE TABLE workers(workername character varying(10),updated timestamp without time zone)
